title: NBCUniversal CEO Jeff Shell steps down following investigation into inappropriate conduct
description: Jeff Shell, the CEO of NBCUniversal, is stepping down "effective immediately," according to a statement released by Comcast Corporation on Sunday.

title: GOP candidates pitch Iowa evangelicals with promises to restrict transgender and abortion rights
description: More than a half-dozen Republican presidential hopefuls took their pitch to religious conservatives at the Iowa Faith and Freedom Coalition's Spring Kick-Off.

title: Clarence Thomas' gifts from a wealthy GOP donor show a 'conflict of interest,' says Sen. Dick Durbin
description: Senate Judiciary Committee Chair Dick Durbin called out Justice Clarence Thomas for allegedly falling short of ethics rules in an interview on NBC News' “Meet the Press."

title: NBC News poll: Nearly 70% of GOP voters stand behind Trump amid indictment, investigations
description: The new NBC News poll shows the GOP rallying around Donald Trump in the wake of his indictment in New York and amid other investigations into his conduct.

title: Why everyone online is calling these Hollywood men 'babygirl'
description: Online, the “Succession” character Kendall Roy has been described as many things: depressed, desperate for attention, cringe.

title: Bed Bath & Beyond files for bankruptcy
description: Bed Bath & Beyond filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy Sunday, ending a tumultuous chapter for the struggling home goods retailer.

title: Leg-lengthening surgery is gaining popularity among men seeking to be taller, doctors say
description: Leg-lengthening is an intense and expensive process, but it has become more popular and accepted in the last five years, a doctor said.

title: New theories of possible link between Covid vaccines and tinnitus are emerging
description: Tinnitus, or ringing in the ears, has been linked to Covid vaccines. The CDC says there's no clear evidence, but researchers point to emerging theories.

title: Florida police decline to make arrests after neighbor shoots at grocery delivery car
description: Police in South Florida said they will not charge a neighbor for shooting at a car being used by a grocery delivery worker who ended up at the wrong address.

title: U.S. personnel and dependents evacuated from embassy in Sudan
description: All U.S. personnel and their dependents under American security have been evacuated from the United States Embassy in Khartoum, Sudan, amid fighting in the country, the State Department said Saturday night.
